services.mainTitle: YOUR GUIDE IN THE STORMY SEA
services.subTitle: OF GLOBAL MARKETS.

advisoryTeam.leftColumn_description1: European Management is a next-generation consulting company, specializing in outsourced management, digital services, and training.
advisoryTeam.leftColumn_description2: It is structured in three different business units that support entrepreneurs, companies, and institutions in their reorganization and market development paths.
advisoryTeam.rightColumn_description1: European Management stands in contrast to the traditional consulting approach. It offers selected clients high value-added solutions that are hard to find in the market.
advisoryTeam.rightColumn_description2: It uses a data-driven approach and accepts challenging contracts, including outcome-based ones, which are remunerated based on agreed performance indicators.
advisoryTeam.boldText_managementTypes: outsourced management, digital services, and training

footer_contact_description: To interact with our offices and work with us, a reference from an existing client or partner company is required.

AboutTeamSection.about_paragraph1: European Management was established as external support for companies in monitoring and studying European public policies with ad hoc consulting and outsourced management solutions. Such paths allow companies and public entities to be more aware of risks and opportunities arising from current or future political and legislative changes.
AboutTeamSection.about_paragraph2: The company subsequently expanded its field of action with new paths in outsourced management and strategic consulting. Starting from 2021, following growing market demand, it dedicated a specific work team to the construction sector, with particular focus on process digitalization, business planning, and management control.
AboutTeamSection.about_paragraph3: In 2024, thanks to international relations and business synergies built over time, European Management added market development to its services through the "out of office" business unit dedicated to marketing, communication, and digital services.
AboutTeamSection.about_modus_subtitle: agility of action and flexibility are the key words that distinguish our work.
AboutTeamSection.about_modus_description: To move successfully in a continuously changing competitive market, European Management focuses on hyper-specialization. For this reason, over the years it has structured an international network of trusted professionals with unique skills who are involved, under the daily coordination of internal referents of each business unit, to make company operations scalable, thus avoiding bureaucracy, organizational heaviness, and consequent slowdowns.

OutsourcedManagement.title: OUTSOURCED MANAGEMENT & CONSULTING
OutsourcedManagement.subtitle: High value-added outsourced management services
OutsourcedManagement.description: We create data-driven digital tools to support management in process management and control.
OutsourcedManagement.contact_text: To interact with our offices and work with us, a reference from an existing client or partner company is required.

outsourced_management.title: OUTSOURCED MANAGEMENT
outsourced_management.intro1: We live in an era of epochal economic, social, and technological changes that require new skills and rapid action. Complex factors to obtain without proper investments and with only internal resources.
outsourced_management.intro2: For this reason, European Management specializes in supporting Italian and multinational companies with outsourced management assignments to manage
outsourced_management.introC: in specific geographical areas, innovation and

digital_management.title: Digital for Business Management
digital_management.intro: Starting from 2021, E.M.I. has dedicated a specific work team to the digital construction sector, specializing in:
list: process automation through custom software based on machine learning
digital_management.outro: The challenge is to support companies, cooperatives, and business networks in achieving their growth objectives with a data-driven digital approach in a sector typically not accustomed to change

digital_resources.title: Digital for Resource Optimization
digital_resources.intro: European Management with digitalization makes business processes leaner and more controllable while promoting ecological transition. How?
list: Through measurement and traceability of environmental impact (Carbontrack project)
Through integration of hardware and software for robotized production (ATI Dolomiti Grow for Defense Industries Agencies tender)
Through database integration for information research from open sources (OSINT DB project)
digital_resources.outro: These are just some of the digital solutions supporting business management that we have created and implemented to fulfill our

public_policy.description: We provide local authorities, governments, and public administrations with next-generation statistical and IT tools that enable strategic decisions to be made in an informed and conscious way.
public_policy.title: PUBLIC POLICY
public_policy.intro: European Management supports, with high professional standards, companies and entrepreneurs in
public_policy.intro2: local and European, and their impact on their interests and business models.
list: being more aware of risks and opportunities arising from current or future political and legislative changes
simulating their impact on their interests
being able to consequently plan strategic agreements or new alliances

digital_public_policy.title: Digital public policy
digital_public_policy.intro: We provide local authorities, governments, and public administrations with next-generation statistical and IT tools that help improve public policy planning. Specifically, our solutions, developed in scientific partnership with Quaeris, a renowned Italian research institute, enable public decision-makers to make informed decisions thanks to greater knowledge and information.

citizen_satisfaction.title: Citizen Satisfaction:
list: Measure and accurately map citizen sentiment by geographic area on specific topics of interest and its evolution over time.
Thanks to the collected data, public decision-makers can make better decisions based on real intentions and interests.

quality_monitor.title: Quality Monitor:
quality_monitor.intro: Thanks to innovative custom-developed software, we help large private and public companies understand their real daily impact on their users.
list: We replace with a digital solution the work usually performed by an entire department of analysts.
We support management in understanding the actual value of delivered services by facilitating comparison of companies in the same sector through standard parameters.

microtargeting_ai.title: Microtargeting with Artificial Intelligence (AI)
microtargeting_ai.intro: Traditional surveys offer static numbers, while dynamic microtargeting combined with web monitoring and AI allows you to:
list: IDENTIFY OPINION PERSONAS on specific topics of public interest (healthcare, citizen services, infrastructure, events, welfare, etc.)
Identify OPTIMAL TOPICS AND COMMUNICATION TONES to correctly engage with each identified homogeneous group;
QUICKLY AND EFFECTIVELY ADAPT communication and awareness strategies;

hero.subtitle: The Digital Business Unit of European Management develops advanced AI-powered automation solutions tailored for the construction and maintenance sectors. It integrates hardware, software, and artificial intelligence to drive efficiency, accelerate business growth, and enable scalability.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description_intro: Agentic AI Framework for Automation in Construction and Industry
innovation.description1: We have developed and continue to customize an intelligent framework that transforms the way construction and maintenance companies operate. The solution empowers organizations to:
description_list: Rethink budget planning and quotations with higher accuracy and efficiency
Monitor daily processes and track results in real time
Identify and manage risks by comparing expected outcomes with actual performance
innovation.description3: We start from business knowledge, not technology. By understanding how companies grow and scale, we integrate AI and blockchain to deliver simple, effective, and accessible solutions—without the prohibitive costs that hold back innovation.

team.title: Sintija Birgele
team.description: Software Architect with 8+ years of experience in enterprise software engineering, specializing in web technologies and applied Artificial Intelligence. Expert in designing and building agentic AI frameworks for the insurance, automotive, and energy sectors.
